hotel_description:

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV and DVD player, as well as an iPod docking station and a CD player are provided.

A microwave and coffee machine are also provided. Each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Bed linen is offered.

Every morning breakfast is served. Guests can prepare coffee in their room with a coffee machine.

L'Esquisse Hotel & Spa, a 5-star MGallery Hotel Collection boutique hotel, promises you a warm and luxurious stay: 62 rooms & suites with unparalleled comfort, the Spa by Clarins and a gastronomic experience at the JY's restaurant.

A contemporary urban hotel with authentic elegance, a pure celebration of the French art of living.

hotel_name: Aux petits cœurs de COLMAR CENTRE WIFI
hotel_description:
Located in the centre of Colmar, Au Petits Coeurs de Colmar is 100 metres from La Petite Venise and 25 metres from the Natural History Museum. This self-catering apartment offers free WiFi access and a washing machine.

A DVD player and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are provided at this duplex apartment. The bathroom is fitted with a shower. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a stove and a microwave. A fridge, a coffee machine and a toaster are also provided. The apartment features exposed beams.

This apartment is 550 metres from the Bartholdi Museum and a 13-minute drive from Colmar Train Station.
